pages.text: Oxygen is produced by splitting water using an $(l:block/electrolytic_separator)Electrolytic Seperator$(/l), which also produces $(l:chemicals/hydrogen)Hydrogen$(/l)

It is used in the $(l:block/purification_chamber)Purification Chamber$(/l), part of $(l:ore_processing/tripling)Ore Tripling$(/l).  It is also combined with $(l:chemicals/sulfur_trioxide)Sulfur Trioxide$(/l) in the $(l:block/chemical_infuser)Chemical Infuser$(/l) to make $(l:chemicals/sulfur_dioxide)Sulfur Dioxide$(/l), as well as in the $(l:item/scuba_mask)Scuba Mask$(/l).
